example.name: pretty boring verb, but pretty
example.text: Then we drove on, until there was no more road and we traversed dry rice fields, bouncing across their squat earth walls.

example.name: passive with split constituent
example.text: [A third, one of at least equal and perhaps even greater importance,]-4 is now being traversed [*-4]: American immersion and involvement in world affairs.

example.name: obligatory Peter Paul and Mary garden-pathing example
example.text: John saw Mary traverse the cherry lane.
